程序包 net.minecraftforge.client

类 ItemModelMesherForge

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.renderer.ItemModelMesher
      • net.minecraftforge.client.ItemModelMesherForge
  • public class ItemModelMesherForge
extends ItemModelMesher
    Wrapper around ItemModeMesher that cleans up the internal maps to respect ID remapping.
